articles.title: Chris Mason: Greenland and Ukraine point to Trump's head-spinning unpredictability - BBC
articles.description: This week has seen two case studies in how Europe is trying to bind the US into its future, writes the BBC's political editor.

articles.title: US may seize oil tanker heading for Europe, reports say - BBC
articles.description: US officials have a warrant to seize the Russian-flagged ship accused of breaking sanctions.
articles.content:
Kayleen Devlin,BBC Verify senior journalist
